alert.note: Alert for Northern Cayuga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued November 20 at 2:04PM EST until November 21 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches in the most persistent lake snows. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph resulting in blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Northern Cayuga county. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Experimental content below...do not use operationally To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4340 7586 4346 7581 4352 7644 4351 7653 4336 7680 4326 7664 4320 7626 4328 7620 4320 7608 4316 7588 TIME Y22M11D20T1800Z-Y22M11D21T0600Z
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
